page.shortlink: api sockets object is open function
page.deprecated: The *[xb:SOCKETS]* object is deprecated and may be removed in a future release. Use *[link:INET::Socket@https://documentation.alphasoftware.com/index?search=api%20inet%20namespace%20socket%20class%20index]* instead.
page.description: The .ISOPEN() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the connection is open; .F. (FALSE) otherwise.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. (TRUE) = The connection is open, .F. (FALSE) = The connection is closed
